alert.note: Alert for Leake; Rankin; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 9:21PM CDT until June 14 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Leake County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Rankin County in central Mississippi... Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 920 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gluckstadt, moving east at 60 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR Norther Rankin County. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fannin around 925 PM CDT. Goshen Springs and Pisgah around 930 PM CDT. Leesburg, Branch and Ludlow around 940 PM CDT. Forkville around 945 PM CDT. Hillsboro and Harperville around 955 PM CDT. Steele around 1000 PM CDT. Sebastopol around 1005 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
